title: 3 Bed 3 Bath House, Fenced Patio, 2-Car Garage, Close to Shopping
posting_body: Available 9/21/2022.
Application fee $35/adult.
1-year or 18-month lease.
Other lease terms maybe negotiated with additional rent.
Pets are allowed with additional deposits and monthly rent.
Small dogs (30lbs or less) and cats, $250/pet non-refundable deposit, $15/pet additional monthly rent.
Medium dogs (30-50lbs), $300/pet non-refundable deposit, $20/pet additional monthly rent.
Large dogs (over 50lbs) $400/pet non-refundable deposit, $25/pet additional monthly rent.
Mins to Walmart and Sam's club.
OUTDOOR SPACE LOVERS~WELCOME HOME TO THIS QUAINT TRI-LEVEL IN POPULAR SADDLE ROCK
RIDGE
DRIPPING IN CHARM INSIDE & OUT*TASTEFUL FENCED IN FRONT PORCH WITH GATE ACCESS GREETS YOU AS YOU OPEN THE FRONT DOOR TO THE OPEN VAULTED FORMAL LIVING/DINING ROOM
FRAMED BY THE FRONT BAY WINDOW LETTING IN LOADS OF NATURAL LIGHT*STUNNING EAT-IN KITCHEN BOASTING ON TREND WHITE SHAKER CABINETRY,

TEXTURED PENCIL TILE BACKSPLASH, MATCHING SS APPLIANCES INCLUDING GAS COOKTOP & OVERSIZED TWO BOWL FARM SINK, CORNER PANTRY & BEADBOARD STYLE ISLAND WITH OVERHANG EXTENSION FOR STOOL SEATING & EXPOSED
SHELVES FOR ALL OF YOUR FAVORITE COOKBOOKS OR DECOR*LUXURIOUS MARBLE FLOORING & BRAZILIAN ROSEWOOD FLOORS WIND THROUGHOUT ALL LEVELS*TAKE
THE WROUGHT IRON STAIRCASE TO THE UPPER LEVEL & FIND THE PRIVATE VAULTED
PRIMARY BEDROOM FEATURING THE HIGH END 3/4 BATH INCLUDING MARBLE ACCENTS & SPACIOUS WALK
IN CLOSET!*TWO SECONDARY BEDROOMS

THAT SHARE UPDATED FULL BATH OFF HALLWAY & LOFT/NOOK PERFECT FOR A READING CHAIR OR WORK-FROM-HOME OFFICE*RELAX IN THE COZY LOWER LEVEL FAMILY ROOM COMPLETE WITH BRIGHT BAY WINDOW & UPDATED PLANTATION SHUTTERS & BUILT-INS ON EITHER SIDE OF ENTERTAINMENT CENTER FOR CUSTOM FEEL*LOWER LEVEL LAUNDRY ROOM & HALF BATH WITH FLOOR TO CEILING MARBLE*SLIDING GLASS DOOR TAKES YOU OUTSIDE TO THE TRUE OUTDOOR

OASIS PRESENTING THE GIANT REDWOOD DECK WITH BUILT-IN CUSTOM DECO WALL WITH BENCH FOR ULTIMATE PRIVACY, DREAMY PERGOLA, PROFESSIONALLY LANDSCAPED YARD INCLUDING MATURE TREES, RIVER ROCK AND GORGEOUS PLANTERS!*THAT'S NOT IT~NEARLY 500 SF IN WIDE OPEN BASEMENT FEATURING EPOXY FLOORING FOR ALL OF YOUR STORAGE NEEDS OR MAKESHIFT GYM, PLAY ROOM, OFFICE & BEYOND!*RESTORATION

HARDWARE LIGHTING*ATTACHED TWO CAR GARAGE WITH BUILT-INS*REFRIGERATOR IN BASEMENT & WASHER/DRYER INCLUDED*AWARD WINNING CHERRY CREEK SCHOOLS*CLOSE PROXIMITY TO E470, DIA, BUCKLEY AFB, POPULAR GOLF COURSES, TRAILS, UPSCALE SHOPPING & DINING AT SOUTHLANDS, AURORA RESERVOIR & MORE!*BE FIRST TO SEE!
